settings.title: We are the new face of professional gaming.

settings.html:
<style>
model-viewer{
    width:50%;
    height: 50vh;
}
@media (max-width: 1024px) {
model-viewer{
    height:300px;
}
}
@media (max-width: 767px) {
model-viewer{
    height:350px;
}
}
</style>

<script src="https://unpkg.com/@webcomponents/webcomponentsjs@2.1.3/webcomponents-loader.js"></script> 

<model-viewer
    src="https://paulobanas.tech/wp-content/uploads/computer_and_laptop/scene.gltf"
    shadow-intensity="1"
    disable-zoom
    camera-controls
    auto-rotate
>
</model-viewer>

<script type="module" src="https://unpkg.com/@google/model-viewer/dist/model-viewer.min.js"></script>
<script nomodule src="https://unpkg.com/@google/model-viewer/dist/model-viewer-legacy.js"></script>

settings.editor: "In the realm of online games, every click is a step into a digital adventure, where victory is not just a destination but a symphony of strategy, skill, and the camaraderie forged in pixels."

settings.title:
COD | Summer Split
Player & ESports All About

eSports demands a high level of skill, strategic thinking, and teamwork. It's not just about mastering the game mechanics but also understanding the nuances of each game and adapting to ever-evolving strategies.

settings.editor:
The thrill of eSports lies in the intense battles where split-second decisions can determine victory or defeat.

What makes eSports truly enticing is its inclusivity. It welcomes players from diverse backgrounds, regardless of age, gender, or nationality. Whether you're a seasoned gamer or someone looking to explore a new passion, there's a place for you in the world of eSports.

Joining eSports opens the door to a global community of like-minded individuals, all driven by a shared love for gaming excellence. You'll find camaraderie, friendship, and the opportunity to test your skills on a competitive stage. As eSports continues to gain mainstream recognition, the potential for personal and professional growth in this field is boundless.

settings.description_text_b: This team are specialized in Counter Strike
This team are specialized in Over Watch
This team are specialized in Fortnite

settings.editor: Get ready to witness the clash of titans in the upcoming eSports extravaganza that promises to redefine the landscape of online gaming. As the anticipation builds, elite gamers from around the globe are gearing up to showcase their unparalleled skills and strategic prowess in a series of heart-pounding matches. Brace yourself for an adrenaline-fueled journey into the virtual realms where every click, every move, and every decision counts. From intense one-on-one duels to high-stakes team battles, this upcoming spectacle is set to deliver a gaming experience like never before. As the virtual arenas light up with cutting-edge graphics and the roar of the crowd echoes through cyberspace, be prepared to immerse yourself in a world where pixels transform into glory, and champions are forged in the crucible of competition. The stage is set, the players are primed, and the only thing missing is you – join us in the digital coliseum for an unforgettable gaming showdown that will leave you on the edge of your seat, craving for more.
